page.title: 09HOME LIFE
page.content: A day in the life of an old age pensioner. When a man reaches 65 years old and a woman reaches 60 years old, they become old age pensioners and recieve money from the government. What is your name?{Mrs Rebecca {Wardle.}Where do you live?{24 {Lichfield Street, near Gerald Road.} How old are you?{I am 80 yrs old, born {February 1905.}What time do you get up?{Around 7.00-8.00 a.m.}What do you do after breakfast?{I clean up around {the house and make my bed.}Do you live alone?{Yes.}Do you have any visitors?{ {My daughter comes twice a week and I {have a home help (}someone who helps those who have difficulties in helping themselves as they get older.{)}Do you go to Day Centres, Bingo ect.?{No, I {find it hard to get around.}Does your daily routine ever change?{No,unless
